00077 template <typename T>
00078 class PandoraInputType
00079 {
00080 public:
00084     PandoraInputType();
00085 
00089     ~PandoraInputType();
00090 
00096     PandoraInputType(const T &t);
00097 
00103     PandoraInputType(const PandoraInputType<T> &rhs);
00104 
00110     void Set(const T &t);
00111 
00117     const T &Get() const;
00118 
00122     void Reset();
00123 
00129     bool IsInitialized() const;
00130 
00136     bool operator= (const T &rhs); 
00137 
00143     bool operator= (const PandoraInputType<T> &rhs);
00144 
00145 private:
00151     bool IsValid(const T &t) const;
00152 
00153     T      *m_pValue;           
00154     bool    m_isInitialized;    
00155 };

00184 template <typename T>
00185 inline PandoraInputType<T>::PandoraInputType() :
00186     m_pValue(NULL),
00187     m_isInitialized(false)
00188 {
00189 }

00193 template <typename T>
00194 inline PandoraInputType<T>::~PandoraInputType()
00195 {
00196     if (NULL != m_pValue)
00197         delete m_pValue;
00198 }

00202 template <typename T>
00203 inline PandoraInputType<T>::PandoraInputType(const T &t) :
00204     m_pValue(new T(t)),
00205     m_isInitialized(true)
00206 {
00207 }

00211 template <typename T>
00212 inline PandoraInputType<T>::PandoraInputType(const PandoraInputType<T> &rhs) :
00213     m_pValue(NULL),
00214     m_isInitialized(rhs.m_isInitialized)
00215 {
00216     if (rhs.m_isInitialized)
00217         m_pValue = new T(*rhs.m_pValue);
00218 }

00220 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 
00222 template <typename T>
00223 inline void PandoraInputType<T>::Set(const T &t)
00224 {
00225     if (m_isInitialized)
00226         delete m_pValue;
00227 
00228     if (!this->IsValid(t))
00229         throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00230 
00231     m_pValue = new T(t);
00232     m_isInitialized = true;
00233 }
00234 
00235 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 
00237 template <typename T>
00238 inline const T &PandoraInputType<T>::Get() const
00239 {
00240     if (!m_isInitialized)
00241         throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED);
00242 
00243     return *m_pValue;
00244 }
00245 
00246 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00247 
00248 template <typename T>
00249 inline void PandoraInputType<T>::Reset()
00250 {
00251     if (NULL != m_pValue)
00252         delete m_pValue;
00253 
00254     m_isInitialized = false;
00255     m_pValue = NULL;
00256 }
00257 
00258 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259 
00260 template <typename T>
00261 inline bool PandoraInputType<T>::IsInitialized() const
00262 {
00263     return m_isInitialized;
00264 }
00265 
00266 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00267 
00268 template <typename T>
00269 inline bool PandoraInputType<T>::operator= (const T &rhs)
00270 {
00271     this->Set(rhs);
00272     return m_isInitialized;
00273 }
00274 
00275 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276 
00277 template <typename T>
00278 inline bool PandoraInputType<T>::operator= (const PandoraInputType<T> &rhs)
00279 {
00280     if (this == &rhs)
00281         return m_isInitialized;
00282 
00283     if (rhs.m_isInitialized)
00284     {
00285         this->Set(*rhs.m_pValue);
00286     }
00287     else
00288     {
00289         this->Reset();
00290     }
00291 
00292     return m_isInitialized;
00293 }

00297 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00298     #include <float.h>
00299     #define IS_NAN _isnan
00300     #define IS_INF !_finite
00301 #else
00302     #define IS_NAN std::isnan
00303     #define IS_INF std::isinf
00304 #endif
00305 
00306 template <typename T>
00307 inline bool PandoraInputType<T>::IsValid(const T &t) const
00308 {
00309     return !(IS_NAN(t) || IS_INF(t));
00310 }
00311 
00312 template <>
00313 inline bool PandoraInputType<void *>::IsValid(void *const &) const
00314 {
00315     return true;
00316 }
00317 
00318 template <>
00319 inline bool PandoraInputType<HitType>::IsValid(const HitType &t) const
00320 {
00321     return !(IS_NAN(static_cast<unsigned int>(t)) || IS_INF(static_cast<unsigned int>(t)));
00322 }
00323 
00324 template <>
00325 inline bool PandoraInputType<DetectorRegion>::IsValid(const DetectorRegion &t) const
00326 {
00327     return !(IS_NAN(static_cast<unsigned int>(t)) || IS_INF(static_cast<unsigned int>(t)));
00328 }
00329 
00330 template <>
00331 inline bool PandoraInputType<CartesianVector>::IsValid(const CartesianVector &t) const
00332 {
00333     return !(IS_NAN(t.GetX()) || IS_NAN(t.GetY()) || IS_NAN(t.GetZ()) ||
00334         IS_INF(t.GetX()) || IS_INF(t.GetY()) || IS_INF(t.GetZ()));
00335 }
00336 
00337 template <>
00338 inline bool PandoraInputType<TrackState>::IsValid(const TrackState &t) const
00339 {
00340     const CartesianVector &p(t.GetPosition());
00341     const CartesianVector &m(t.GetMomentum());
00342 
00343     return !(IS_NAN(p.GetX()) || IS_NAN(p.GetY()) || IS_NAN(p.GetZ()) ||
00344         IS_INF(p.GetX()) || IS_INF(p.GetY()) || IS_INF(p.GetZ()) ||
00345         IS_NAN(m.GetX()) || IS_NAN(m.GetY()) || IS_NAN(m.GetZ()) ||
00346         IS_INF(m.GetX()) || IS_INF(m.GetY()) || IS_INF(m.GetZ()));
00347 }
